title: Suttum Sudar Vizhi Lyrics Siraichalai
stanzas:
suttum sudar vizhi
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi. (2)

nilavai pottum vaithu
pavala pattum katti
arugil nirkkum unnai
varavaerppen naan
varavaerppen naan

suttum sudar vizhi
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi.

unadhu peyare mandhiram
ena oadhuven oadhuven
minminigalil nam ninaivinai
thaeduvaen thaeduvaen (2)

sandhangalil nanaiyuthe
mounangal thaagamaai.
mannan mugam thondri varum
kannile deepamaai

indrum unai naan
paaduven geethanjaliyaai
uyire uyire
priyamae sagi.

iru vizhigalil
uyir vazhiyuthu
oomaiyaai oomaiyaai.
ulmadiyinil malar
vizhunthadhu sogamaai
sogamaai. (2)

vinnulagam eriyuthe
pournami thaangumaa
indru enthan sooriyan
kaalaiyil thoongumo.

kanavil unai naan
serndhida imaiye thadaiyaa
virindhaal siragai
ingu siluvaiyaa.

suttum sudar vizhi
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi. (2)

nilavai pottum vaithu
pavala pattum katti
arugil nirkkum unnai
varavaerppen naan
varavaerppen naan

suttum sudar vizhi
paarvaiyile thoondilidum devi
kathum kadal alai
thaandi vandhum
theenduthu un aavi (2)
